Description: Degraded wood fragments, 4 larger pieces (0.5 cm2 - 3cm2) and many uncountable tiny fragments. Evidence of rot, plaster type material attached to 1 piece and is very friable. In a bad condition. The object card shows that this was originally a wooden elongated object of more than 14cm, maybe a handle of some tool. Widens towards one end, this part is preserved and measured.
